snippet: Blue Bell Creameries resumed selling its products at select locations on Monday, four months after it halted sales because of listeria contamination.
lead_paragraph: Blue Bell Creameries resumed selling its products at select locations on Monday, four months after it halted sales because of listeria contamination.

headline.main: Blue Bell Ice Cream Back on Shelves in Two States
headline.print_headline: Blue Bell Ice Cream Back On Shelves In Two States
